intro_text: Your patrol doesn't find anything useful.
success_text: It was still a fun outing!
decline_text: Your patrol decides to head home early.

intro_text: The patrol finds a nice spot to sun themselves.
success_text: The sunlight feels great and they have a pleasant patrol.
fail_text: The patrol doesn't get much done because of that.
decline_text: They decide to stay focused instead.

intro_text: The patrol comes across a thunderpath.
success_text: Your patrol crosses the thunderpath and can hunt on the other side.
s_c hears the growl of a monster rumbling closer and freezes in a crouch in the middle of the thunderpath. The monster goes right over them but miraculously leaves them unharmed.
fail_text: r_c hears a monster thundering towards them, but it screeches to a halt just in time. That was close! Maybe it's best to go back to camp.
r_c is hit by a monster while crossing and dies instantly.
r_c is hit by a monster and debates retiring to the elder den.
decline_text: They decide it is better not to cross.

intro_text: p_l finds a patch of herbs that they believe the medicine cat mentioned they needed.
success_text: The patrol brings the herbs back to camp and they are put to good use.
fail_text: The herbs turn out to be useless weeds.
decline_text: They decide to focus on the patrol instead and leave the herb collecting to the medicine cat.

intro_text: r_c goes missing during the patrol.
success_text: r_c is later found carrying loads of prey after a successful hunt.
fail_text: r_c is found lying injured on the ground.

intro_text: Your patrol comes across a small fallen tree blocking their path.
success_text: Your patrol successfully moves the tree out of the way and continues the patrol.
fail_text: Your patrol can't seem to move the tree out of the way and is discouraged.
decline_text: Your patrol decides to find another route to continue to patrol.

intro_text: While alone on patrol, r_c thinks about life.
success_text: They find peace within themselves and enjoy the rest of the patrol.
fail_text: Their thoughts are plagued with bad memories.
decline_text: r_c decides to focus on the patrol.

intro_text: Since r_c is alone, they debate taking a bite out of the freshkill they have just caught.
success_text: They decide not to and end up catching extra prey for the kits and elders.
fail_text: They eat the freshkill; however, they do not catch more prey to make up for it and the kits and elders go hungry.
decline_text: They shake the thought from their mind.

intro_text: r_c notices a Clanmate trapped in some brambles.
fail_text: The patrol works all day to free their Clanmate and gets nothing else done.
decline_text: r_c runs back to camp to fetch help and rejoins the patrol later.

intro_text: The patrol comes across a strange Twoleg object smelling slightly of smoke and prey.
success_text: The patrol interprets the purpose of the object. It seems like Twolegs light their freshkill on fire before eating it! How strange.
fail_text: The patrol can't seem to interpret the purpose of the object.
decline_text: The patrol decides to avoid the Twoleg object
